item.title: ssllabs.com test says that there's chain issues (Incorrect order, Extra certs)
item.description: This could be an incorrect use of certificates. Make sure to use the following (translate to nginx if you're not using apache) 1SSLCertificateFile /etc/letsencrypt/live/example.com/cert.pem 2SSLCertificateKeyFile /etc/letsencrypt/live/example.com/privkey.pem 3Include /etc/letsencrypt/options-ssl-apache.conf 4SSLCertificateChainFile /etc/letsencrypt/live/example.com/chain.pem In my case, the issue was on SSLCertificateChainFile. Instead of using "chain.pem", I incorrectly used "fullchain.pem".
